title: The Birth of UNIX - CoRecursive Podcast
description: When you work on your computer, there are so many things you take for granted: operating systems, programming languages, they all have to come from somewhere.In the late 1960s and 1970s, that somewhere was Bell Labs, and the operating system they were building was UNIX.They were building more than just an operating system though. They were building a way to... [â€¦]
